title: Natchez National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        Reservations Church groups, school groups and groups of 13 or more, please make reservations by calling (601) 446-5790 or e-mail the group coordinator.  Reservations must be made two weeks or more in advance. Please fill out a group request form and mail to: National Park Service Attn: Tour Reservations 640 South Canal Street, Ste. E Natchez, MS 39120 Permits A special use permit is required for any activities on park grounds (at Melrose, William Johnson House, or Fort Rosalie) beyond normal visitation activities.  For more information contact Jeff Mansell at (601) 445-5347.  The park will not issue special use permits for weddings on the grounds or inside any historic structures, but wedding photography is allowed on the grounds at Melrose.
